meanings.definition: An early or primitive human ancestor.
meanings.sent1: The protohuman walked on two legs.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of protohumans to learn about our past.
meanings.sent3: The curious protohuman tried to use a smartphone but couldn't figure it out.
meanings.sent4: In the museum, the exhibit showcased the evolution from protohuman to modern human.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the reconstruction of a protohuman family in the museum.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to early human ancestors.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologist discovered a protohuman tool made of stone.
meanings.sent2: The cave paintings provided insight into protohuman culture.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a collection inspired by protohuman fashion trends.
meanings.sent4: The old ruins showed signs of protohuman habitation.
meanings.sent5: The documentary explored the landscapes where protohuman tribes once roamed.
